title: Got into game and couldn't do anything
body: The normal pointer was my mouse cursor and clicking or pressing any buttons didn't do anything

replies.body:
That must be really frustrating, sorry that happened to ya.  Unless there is a third party app or hardware issue getting in the way, this could be a config corruption.  A config reset may help, just be sure to test it first:

Log into the game client.
Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
Delete the file  named **game.cfg** and **persistedsettings.json**
Go into a custom game and verify that settings have saved properly.  Leave game to sync settings.

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=tbzfq9ge,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-01-18T00:00:57.197+0000)
>
> That must be really frustrating, sorry that happened to ya.  Unless there is a third party app or hardware issue getting in the way, this could be a config corruption.  A config reset may help, just be sure to test it first:
> 
> Log into the game client.
> Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
> Delete the file  named **game.cfg** and **persistedsettings.json**
> Go into a custom game and verify that settings have saved properly.  Leave game to sync settings.

just tried this and still hasn't fixed the issue
This is really odd!  Are you using any third party apps for your peripherals like synapse, or one that interacts with League?  Is the issue happening every match (test it in customs)?

not using anything that interacts with league, been playing for a few years now and never had an issue like this. played 2-3 games yesterday or day before perfectly fine and yes it's happening in  every match
Nix that.  Are you using Discord overlay?  It looks like it's the cause.  It's been causing issues now and then, this one is a new one.

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=tbzfq9ge,comment-id=00000001000000000000,timestamp=2018-01-18T00:48:49.919+0000)
>
> Nix that.  Are you using Discord overlay?  It looks like it's the cause.  It's been causing issues now and then, this one is a new one.

Its discord, I just fixed it.
What if I don't have discord?

Yeah I just tried this out. When I quit discord everything went back to normal. Any reason why this might be? And if you do know, what can we do to fix it if we primarily use Discord to communicate with our teammates/friends?

i've had this as well in my ranked placement game just now, 20 mins of trying to reconnect, doing full client troubleshoots from the login screen, no idea why it's occured as i played fine before. No idea how i can fix this. you can't even open the menu with keyboard, cant click anything as OP said you don't get given the LOL cursor you get your pc cursor and cant do anything. you can load into the game, watch what is happening and see the game unfold while your champion is sitting at base and you're screen is just stuck on the champ as that's where the screen starts at the nexus. it's like you're a spectator in the game but you're stuck on champ and have no control over anything. couldn't even close the game without having to end task it from task manager as i couldn't click on the defeat button once the ennemy team killed our nexus or open the menu.
Confirming: Closing discord worked for me as well.
dont even have installed and never have had it installed and Im getting this issue still

There's another thread with a guy with the same problem. I just had an opponent having the same problem as you aswell. I think it's league and not your PC's fault. Just a glitch.. (don't know how to fix it.)

I just ran into this problem 30 minutes ago. Lost two placements because of it (remakes). I went into a practice mode and I still couldn't do anything. I do have discord app running, but could it really be that? Everything was fine yesterday. I played six games with discord up!
Confirming that discord is what was causing the issue.
